title: Oded Ezer
description: Typographer Oded Ezer talks about the idea of a universal language — and how his limitations as a musican and poet led to his extraordinary typography.
itunes:subtitle: Typographer Oded  Ezer talks about the idea of a universal language — and how his limitations as a musican and poet led to his  extraordinary typography.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
itunes:author: Debbie Millman
